ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh mage pets are close to the same as a necro pet. Well I suppose the words would be easy to get over time but when I hit 50 it just wasn t heard of to have a
ygData.messageBody:
Heh mage pets are close to the same as a necro pet. Well I suppose the words
would be easy to get over time but when I hit 50 it just wasn't heard of to
have a 49th pet. Took me 1 1/2 months just to get the spell. Saturation of
the market makes this game so easy.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeff Illian <jeff@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, January 28, 2000 9:20 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] PoA bard quests plus a rant


>From: "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...>
>
>>
>> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>>
>> Err should be get not use. The research words are ungodly hard to
>> find even
>> for the 44th pet let alone 49th. I know quite a few 50 necros
>> using the 39th
>> and even the 34th pet.
>>
>> Naeeldar
>
>Not on Prexus! I've grouped with maybe 8 or 9 level 49 or 50 necros and
all
>but one had the level 49 pet. The one I do know that was still using the
>level 44 pet was doing so just because he had no INCENTIVE to get a level
49
>pet! He simply didn't think he needed that much more fire power and it
>wasn't worth his time... besides he was having too much fun twinking his
>bard :-). I can't imagine a mage begin very effective with a pet 10 to 15
>levels lower then him.
>
>
>Taneran
>
